summary: Client requested that helloworld be updated to say "hi dude". The developer executed change request req_1760980033978 and updated helloworld.py; PM, Architect, and QA did not provide comments.

decisions.title: Update helloworld.py message
decisions.details: Change request req_1760980033978 executed to modify helloworld.py so its output reads 'hi dude'.

sign_offs.what: Executed change request req_1760980033978 and updated helloworld.py

actions.task: Validate the change in helloworld.py, run relevant tests, and confirm no regressions

risks.risk: Change was implemented without explicit PM/Architect/QA approval or prior review.
risks.mitigation: Have QA validate the change and run full test suite; request retrospective review from PM and Architect and monitor production logs for anomalies.
